titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: ASSAULT LOCATION DESCRIPTION - Description

div.p: ASSAULT LOCATION DESCRIPTION is the same as attribute PERSON OBSERVATION TEXT STRING.
ASSAULT LOCATION DESCRIPTION provides further comment and/or details of the LOCATION where an assault took place.
ASSAULT LOCATION DESCRIPTION may only be completed when the assault LOCATION is NOT a Home or Private Address, as this could identify the PATIENT.
